mapper.insert: insert into board values(SEQ_BOARD.nextVal, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, 'Y', #{userNum}, 3)
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where board_status = 'Y' and board_type = 3
mapper.insert: insert into attachment values(SEQ_ATTACH.nextval, SYSDATE, #{attachName}, #{attachRename}, #{attachPath}, #{boardType}, SEQ_BOARD.currval, 'Y')
mapper.select: select * from attachment where board_type= 3 and SERIALNUMBER = #{ boardNum }

select board.board_num, board.board_type, board.board_title, board.board_content, board.board_createDate, board.board_modifyDate, board.board_view, board.board_status, board.user_num, attachment.attach_rename, attachment.SERIALNUMBER from board left join attachment on (board.board_num = attachment.SERIALNUMBER) WHERE board.BOARD_type=3 and attachment.board_type=3 and board_status = 'Y' order by board.board_num desc
select * from board where board_status ='Y' and board_type= 3 and board_num = #{ boardNum }
mapper.delete: delete from clip where board_num = #{boardNum} and user_num = #{userNum}
mapper.select: select * from clip join board using(board_num) where board_num = #{boardNum} and board_type = 3
mapper.update: update board set board_status = 'N' where board_num = #{ boardNum } and board_type = 3
update board set board_title = #{ boardTitle }, board_content = #{ boardContent }, board_status = 'Y' where board_num = #{ boardNum } and board_type = 3
